item.title: Mocking AWS Postgres Extensions
item.description: Mocking AWS PG Extensions The project I am working on uses RDS with aws_s3 (& aws_commons) postgres extensions. However these extensions are also need postgres docker container used in the CI for integration tests to not break the migrations. A mock extension was built to keep the tests from breaking. Create .control files Create the schema for the module being created Add the functions in the schema in sql files In this case there are two .
